nodes.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
nodes.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle
nodes.author: Olivér Papp

localize.description: Blixi是一款轻松的益智游戏，拥有精美的neumorphic设计和创新的新鲜玩法。在不断更新的排行榜上，与来自世界各地的玩家一起争夺最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休闲游戏。
localize.tagline: 清新的彩色拼图

localize.description: Blixi是一款輕鬆的益智遊戲，擁有精美的neumorphic設計和創新的新鮮玩法。在不斷更新的排行榜上，與來自世界各地的玩家一起爭奪最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休閒遊戲。
localize.tagline: 清新的彩色拼圖

nodes.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
nodes.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.
nodes.author: James Quinn

localize.description: 与你的团队激发友好竞争，提高士气，来自 Slack! 大家轮流抽签，猜测提示。你猜得越快，得到的分数就越多。非常适合在会议前、周四社交、或只是休息时使用。最多可容纳12人。
localize.tagline: Pictionary, for Slack.

localize.description: 與你的團隊激發友好競爭，提高士氣，來自 Slack! 大家輪流抽籤，猜測提示。你猜得越快，得到的分數就越多。非常適合在會議前、週四社交、或只是休息時使用。最多可容納12人。
localize.tagline: Pictionary, for Slack.

nodes.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart 😁-> profit.
nodes.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components
nodes.author: Vova Tereschenko

localize.description: 用https://styled-components.com/ 创建图表。一个用TS构建的反应库，几乎没有依赖性（没有d3这些东西）。导入一些默认的图表组件为Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新设计样式并添加回图表😁->利润。
localize.tagline: 使用styled-components创建漂亮的图表。

localize.description: 用https://styled-components.com/ 創建圖表。一個用TS構建的反應庫，幾乎沒有依賴性（沒有d3這些東西）。導入一些默認的圖表組件爲Bar、Path、BarGroup，重新設計樣式並添加回圖表😁->利潤。
localize.tagline: 使用styled-components創建漂亮的圖表。

nodes.excerpt: Shub helps businesses & professionals showcase their products & services while cross posting news to other social media channels. Post up/down vote troll limiting newsfeed & topics newsfeed. Add news images video gallery contact resume hashtags
nodes.title: Shub.one - Networking platform to connect the business community
nodes.author: Adrian Wheeler

localize.description: Shub帮助企业和专业人士展示他们的产品和服务，同时将新闻交叉发布到其他社交媒体渠道。发布向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新闻源和主题新闻源。添加新闻图片视频图库联系人简历标签。

localize.description: Shub幫助企業和專業人士展示他們的產品和服務，同時將新聞交叉發佈到其他社交媒體渠道。發佈向上/向下投票的巨魔限制新聞源和主題新聞源。添加新聞圖片視頻圖庫聯繫人簡歷標籤。
localize.tagline: 連接商界的網絡平臺

nodes.excerpt: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.

localize.description: 协作无倦怠。用语音消息组取代背靠背的会议。没有日历，没有视频聊天，只有来回的语音消息组。在您自己的时间开会，收回您的日历。

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.

localize.description: Branch 是您工作和娱乐的空间 ⠀ 通过协作和有趣的虚拟总部，让远程工作中缺少的偶然性、自发的对话、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新回归。

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a habit tracker that helps you do more, by doing less 🥳 ✅ Visualize your entire month at one glance ✅ Set flexible goals instead of streaks ✅ Make notes to reflect on your journey ✅ Fully responsive on mobile Start your 30 days FREE trial today!
nodes.title: DailyHabits - The simplest habit tracker
nodes.author: Aditya

localize.description: 最后，一个习惯追踪器，帮助你做更多的事，做更少的事 🥳✅ 一目了然地看到你整个月的情况 ✅ 设置灵活的目标，而不是连续的目标 ✅ 做笔记来反映你的旅程 ✅ 完全响应的移动端 今天开始你的30天免费试用!
localize.tagline: 最简单的习惯追踪器

nodes.excerpt: Rainbow is a fun, simple, and secure Ethereum wallet that makes managing your assets a joy. 🥇 Best wallet for NFTs 🦄 Uniswap is built-in 🍎 Buy ETH using Apple Pay

nodes.author: Michael Demarais

nodes.excerpt: Play board, card, and party games online with family and friends or gather your remote team for a fun team building activity. GameApart works with any video conference platform. New games are released monthly. Let's get this remote party started!
nodes.title: GameApart - Online board, card & party games on any video conference app
nodes.author: James Simmons

localize.description: 与家人和朋友在线玩棋盘、纸牌和派对游戏，或召集您的远程团队进行有趣的团队建设活动。GameApart可与任何视频会议平台配合使用。每月都会发布新游戏。让我们开始这场远程聚会吧!
localize.tagline: 在任何视频会议应用程序上进行在线棋牌和派对游戏。

localize.tagline: 在任何視頻會議應用程序上進行在線棋牌和派對遊戲。

nodes.excerpt: Listnr helps you start a Podcast in 100+ Voices and 22 languages without recording anything, we use Speech Synthesis technology from Google, Amazon, Microsoft and IBM to power Listnr and deliver great results!
nodes.title: Listnr - Start a podcast without recording anything

localize.description: Listnr帮助你以100多种声音和22种语言开始播客，而无需录制任何东西，我们使用谷歌、亚马逊、微软和IBM的语音合成技术为Listnr提供动力，并提供伟大的结果。
localize.tagline: 不需要录制任何东西就能开始播客

localize.tagline: 不需要錄製任何東西就能開始播客

nodes.excerpt: Shuffle is an online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, and Material-UI. Today, we are launching our marketplace and two new UI libraries for Tailwind! https://shuffle.dev/marketplace

nodes.excerpt: Too many tools? Too many back-and-forths? It's time to build the common ground between remote teams. The only place to truly work together across roles without juggling many tools. Allo is your first remote workspace.
nodes.title: Allo for Desktop - Work together across roles without juggling many tools
nodes.author: Ray Hong

localize.description: 工具太多？太多的来回奔波？是时候建立远程团队之间的共同点了。唯一能真正实现跨角色协同工作的地方，而不需要玩弄许多工具。Allo是您的第一个远程工作空间。
localize.tagline: 跨角色协同工作，不需要使用很多工具。

localize.tagline: 跨角色協同工作，不需要使用很多工具。

nodes.excerpt: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
nodes.title: Suez Canal Blockage - See how much it costs & guess when the blockage is over
nodes.author: Elias

localize.tagline: 看看要花多少钱&猜猜看什么时候堵完了

nodes.excerpt: Exashape is an app that allows you to challenge your own memory. It has a minimal interface with a single focus: "challenging your memory".
nodes.title: Exashape - A minimalist game to challenge your own memory

localize.description: Exashape是一款让你挑战自己记忆力的应用。它的界面极简，只有一个重点："挑战你的记忆力"。
localize.tagline: 一款挑战自己记忆力的极简主义游戏

nodes.excerpt: It's hard to focus when you're stuck at home. 5am coder brings programmers, developers & makers together at 5am for session of deep, focused work.
nodes.title: 5am Coder - Wake up and code alongside developers & makers
nodes.author: Karl Lee

localize.description: 当你被困在家里的时候，很难集中精力。5am coder让程序员、开发者和制造者在凌晨5点聚集在一起，进行深入、专注的工作。
localize.tagline: 醒来后与开发者和制造者一起编写代码

nodes.excerpt: Actuflow is a super simple app, that may change the way you use your phone. The app is for defining intentions before using phone or concrete apps. This is literally all that the app does. This tiny trick may make your device usage more mindful.
nodes.title: Actuflow 3.0 - App for checking why you use your smartphone before using it
nodes.author: Yaroslav Neznaradko (yarsanich)

localize.description: Actuflow是一款超级简单的应用，它可能会改变你使用手机的方式。这款应用是用于在使用手机或具体应用之前定义意图。这简直就是这个应用所做的一切。这个小小的技巧，可能会让你的设备使用更加用心。
localize.tagline: 在使用智能手机之前，检查你为什么要使用它的应用程序。

localize.description: Actuflow是一款超級簡單的應用，它可能會改變你使用手機的方式。這款應用是用於在使用手機或具體應用之前定義意圖。這簡直就是這個應用所做的一切。這個小小的技巧，可能會讓你的設備使用更加用心。
localize.tagline: 在使用智能手機之前，檢查你爲什麼要使用它的應用程序。

nodes.excerpt: Lyne uses an advanced AI model to analyze each of your prospects their online profiles and writes a hyper-personalized introduction to them, which you can use in your cold outreach messaging.
nodes.title: Lyne - Scale your cold email campaigns with AI powered intros
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Lyne使用先进的人工智能模型来分析你的每一个潜在客户的在线资料，并为他们撰写超个性化的介绍，你可以在你的冷门宣传信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驱动的开场白来扩展您的冷门电子邮件营销。

localize.description: Lyne使用先進的人工智能模型來分析你的每一個潛在客戶的在線資料，併爲他們撰寫超個性化的介紹，你可以在你的冷門宣傳信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驅動的開場白來擴展您的冷門電子郵件營銷。

nodes.excerpt: Krypto allows you to invest, trade, gift, and pay with cryptocurrency seamlessly to anyone, anywhere, anytime. 🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free

localize.tagline: 免费使用加密技术进行购买、出售和支付。

localize.description: Krypto允許你在任何時間，任何地點，向任何人無縫地投資，交易，饋贈和支付加密貨幣。🎉 Trade For free 💎 Pay with Crypto to any vendor in India having a UPI address or debit card machine 🚀 Send & Recieve Crypto for free.
localize.tagline: 免費使用加密技術進行購買、出售和支付。

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang

localize.description: Firework将TikTok/IG/Snap Story的体验带入任何网站或任何应用。A轮融资5500万美元，我们的目标是联合开放的互联网（去中心化和开放）来对抗巨大的社交媒体（中心化和封闭）。
localize.tagline: TikTok的B2B版本

localize.description: Firework將TikTok/IG/Snap Story的體驗帶入任何網站或任何應用。A輪融資5500萬美元，我們的目標是聯合開放的互聯網（去中心化和開放）來對抗巨大的社交媒體（中心化和封閉）。
localize.tagline: TikTok的B2B版本

nodes.excerpt: Sleep Formula is your personal sleep assistant that counts your sleep cycles and tracks your sleep. Wake up bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at ANY time even if you stay up late! Analyze your sleep and build healthy habits! Let's do it together!
nodes.title: Sleep Formula - App to improve your sleep using CBT & sleep tracker
nodes.author: Aleksandr Lanin

localize.description: 睡眠公式是您的私人睡眠助手，它可以计算您的睡眠周期，跟踪您的睡眠。即使你熬夜，也能随时醒过来，眼睛亮亮的，尾巴翘翘的! 分析您的睡眠情况，建立健康的生活习惯! 让我们一起做吧!
localize.tagline: 使用CBT和睡眠跟踪器改善睡眠的应用程序。

localize.description: 睡眠公式是您的私人睡眠助手，它可以計算您的睡眠週期，跟蹤您的睡眠。即使你熬夜，也能隨時醒過來，眼睛亮亮的，尾巴翹翹的! 分析您的睡眠情況，建立健康的生活習慣! 讓我們一起做吧!
localize.tagline: 使用CBT和睡眠跟蹤器改善睡眠的應用程序。

nodes.excerpt: Codeally brings candidate management, automatic assessment, and coding together to give technical hiring teams superpowers.

localize.tagline: 通过现实生活中的任务实现开发招聘的自动化。

nodes.excerpt: API Connector is simple solution for data importing from any JSON API to Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow.

nodes.excerpt: Fancy Widget is the ultimate widget App that can make your iPhone home screen look stunning. It starts with a wide collection of beautiful designed widgets, which range in function from clock, to weather, to calendar and step counting.
nodes.title: Fancy Widget - Create fancy widgets on iOS
nodes.author: Joshua Jian

localize.description: Fancy Widget是一款终极的小部件App，它可以让你的iPhone主屏幕看起来很惊艳。它拥有一系列设计精美的小部件，功能从时钟、天气、日历到计步等。
localize.tagline: 在iOS上创建花哨的小部件

localize.description: Fancy Widget是一款終極的小部件App，它可以讓你的iPhone主屏幕看起來很驚豔。它擁有一系列設計精美的小部件，功能從時鐘、天氣、日曆到計步等。
localize.tagline: 在iOS上創建花哨的小部件

nodes.excerpt: The Collections database consists of entries for more than 480,000 works in the Musée du Louvre and Musée National Eugène-Delacroix. Updated on a daily basis, it is the result of the continuous research and documentation efforts carried out by both museums.
nodes.title: Louvre Museum Online - Explore the entirety of the Louvre's collection for free
nodes.author: Vivek Sancheti

localize.description: 藏品数据库包括卢浮宫博物馆和欧仁-德拉克洛瓦国家博物馆480,000多件作品的条目。该数据库每天更新，是两个博物馆不断进行研究和文献工作的结果。
localize.tagline: 免费探索卢浮宫的全部藏品。

localize.description: 藏品數據庫包括盧浮宮博物館和歐仁-德拉克洛瓦國家博物館480,000多件作品的條目。該數據庫每天更新，是兩個博物館不斷進行研究和文獻工作的結果。
localize.tagline: 免費探索盧浮宮的全部藏品。
